languages.text: Чутье Лорд-капитана пробило дурман, окутавший разум. Оказалось, что все это время корабельные астропаты и Навигатор били тревогу, но их сообщения игнорировались. Совместными усилиями они разорвали временную петлю — насмешку варпа, и корабль приготовился к выходу из Эмпиреев.

traits.locale_text: Чутье Лорд-капитана пробило дурман, окутавший разум. Оказалось, что все это время корабельные астропаты и Навигатор били тревогу, но их сообщения игнорировались. Совместными усилиями они разорвали временную петлю — насмешку варпа, и корабль приготовился к выходу из Эмпиреи.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.
languages.original_text: Чутье Лорд-капитана пробило дурман, окутавший разум. Оказалось, что все это время корабельные астропаты и Навигатор били тревогу, но их сообщения игнорировались. Совместными усилиями они разорвали временную петлю — насмешку варпа, и корабль приготовился к выходу из Эмпиреев.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced the mind-numbing haze. It turned out the ship's astropaths and the navigator kept sounding the alarm, but their messages were being ignored. Their combined efforts broke the time loop, a cruel mockery of the warp, and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace.

The Lord Captain's insight pierced the mind-numbing haze. It turned out the ship's astropaths and the navigator kept sounding the alarm, but their messages were being ignored. Their combined efforts broke the time loop, a cruel mockery of the warp, and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace.

The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

languages.text: 领主舰长的洞察力穿透了单调乏味的迷雾。原来，舰船上的星语者和导航者一直都在发出警报，但那些信息却没有传入任何人耳中。在所有人的努力之下，飞船终于打破了时间循环，从至高天的怀抱中冲了出来。亚空间始终都会有各种各样的手段，残酷地嘲弄着它的猎物。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

traits.locale_text: 领主舰长的洞察力穿透了单调乏味的迷雾。原来，舰船上的星语者和导航者一直都在发出警报，但那些信息却没有传入任何人耳中。在所有人的努力之下，飞船终于打破了时间循环，从至高天的怀抱中冲了出来。亚空间始终都会有各种各样的手段，残酷地嘲弄着它的猎物。

languages.text: La perspicacia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán atravesó la niebla que adormecía la mente. Al parecer, los astrópatas y la Navegante habían dado la voz de alarma, pero sus mensajes habían sido ignorados. Sus esfuerzos combinados rompieron finalmente el bucle temporal y liberaron a la nave del abrazo del Empíreo. La disformidad nunca se cansa de su cruel burla.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

traits.locale_text: La perspicacia {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán atravesó la niebla que adormecía la mente. Al parecer, los astrópatas y la Navegante habían dado la voz de alarma, pero sus mensajes habían sido ignorados. Sus esfuerzos combinados rompieron finalmente el bucle temporal y liberaron a la nave del abrazo del Empíreo. La disformidad nunca se cansa de su cruel burla.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの洞察力が、心をモヤモヤさせる霞を突き破った。船の感応通信官と航宙士が警報を鳴らしたようだが、彼らのメッセージは無視されていた。ついに彼らが手を組みタイムループを破り、エンピリアンの手中から船が解放される。<歪み>がその残酷な遊びに飽きることは決してない。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの洞察力が、心をモヤモヤさせる霞を突き破った。船の感応通信官と航宙士が警報を鳴らしたようだが、彼らのメッセージは無視されていた。ついに彼らが手を組みタイムループを破り、エンピリアンの手中から船が解放される。<歪み>がその残酷な遊びに飽きることは決してない。

languages.text: La perspicacité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} perce la brume qui lui obscurcit l'esprit : les astropathes et la navigatrice ont bel et bien lancé plusieurs messages d'alerte, mais ils ont été ignorés. Leurs efforts combinés dissipent finalement la boucle temporelle et libèrent le vaisseau de l'emprise de l'Empyrée. Le Warp ne se lasse jamais de sa cruelle fourberie.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

traits.locale_text: La perspicacité {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine} perce la brume qui lui obscurcit l'esprit : les astropathes et la navigatrice ont bel et bien lancé plusieurs messages d'alerte, mais ils ont été ignorés. Leurs efforts combinés dissipent finalement la boucle temporelle et libèrent le vaisseau de l'emprise de l'Empyrée. Le Warp ne se lasse jamais de sa cruelle fourberie.

languages.text: Die Einsicht des Lord Captain durchbrach den betäubenden Nebel. Offenbar hatten die Astropathen und der Navigator des Schiffs die ganze Zeit Alarm geschlagen, doch ihre Nachrichten waren ignoriert worden. Durch ihre gemeinsamen Bemühungen konnten sie die Zeitschleife endlich durchbrechen und das Schiff aus der Umarmung des Empyreums befreien. Der Warp wird seiner grausamen Neckereien niemals überdrüssig.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.

traits.locale_text: Die Einsicht des Lord Captain durchbrach den betäubenden Nebel. Offenbar hatten die Astropathen und der Navigator des Schiffs die ganze Zeit Alarm geschlagen, doch ihre Nachrichten waren ignoriert worden. Durch ihre gemeinsamen Bemühungen konnten sie die Zeitschleife endlich durchbrechen und das Schiff aus der Umarmung des Empyreums befreien. Der Warp wird seiner grausamen Neckereien niemals überdrüssig.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın sezgisi, zihin uyuşturan sisin ötesine geçti. Görünüşe göre geminin Astropatları ile Rotacı gerekli uyarılarda bulunsa da mesajları göz ardı edilmişti. Ortak çabaları, sonunda zaman döngüsünü kırdı ve gemiyi Gök Diyar'dan kurtardı. Öteboyut, zalim alaylarından asla yorulmaz.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's insight pierced through the mind-numbing haze. It appeared that the ship's Astropaths and the Navigator had been sounding the alarm, but their messages had been ignored. Their combined efforts finally broke the time loop and released the vessel from the Empyrean's embrace. The warp never tires of its cruel mockery.
